updates.title: Accessibility beyond borders
updates.imageAlt: Accessibility Beyond Borders. Global roundtable discussing the challenges and opportunities of digital accessibility in Higher Education. Sharon Austin, Academic Technology Accessibility Specialist, University of Tampa. Terry Greene, Senior eLearning Designer, Trent University, Canada. James Northridge, Inclusive UCC Project Manager, University College Cork (UCC), Ireland. Dr Tharindu Liyanagunawardena, Digital Accessibility Officer, University of Reading, UK. Esin Caglayan, Ph.D., Director of Teaching and Learning Center, Izmir University of Economics, Turkey. Sarah Whittaker, Senior Manager Teaching with Technology, working in United Arab Emirates. Anthology Ally User Group.
updates.description: What did we learn from accessibility leaders at six global Higher Education institutions?

updates.title: Simplify accessibility in HE
